chapter.title: Recovering the Master Admin User
chapter.para: It is possible for the "admin" user in the master realm to become inoperable. This may be because it was accentally deleted, its role mappings were removed, or the password was simply forgotten.

To recover the master admin user, just start the server with the following system property:
bin/standalone.sh -Dkeycloak.recover-admin=true
Then you can log in to the master admin account with the default password "admin". You will then be prompted to immediately change this password.
